title: Cover Picture and Issue Information
content:
Cover image: A European grayling (Thymallus thymayllus) caught in pre-alpine river Iller, South Germany. The species is endangered and locally vanished in Germany and other European countries. Main reasons are altered morphology, hindered migration and reduced habitat connectivity.

Photo by: Thomas Lechner, IBF Umwelt, Germany
siteTitle: Wiley: Ecological Solutions and Evidence: Table of Contents
